name: Bird Poop & Revenge Simulator 2.0
description:
Feeling Crappy & Fueled by Revenge?

Then do I have the game for you: Bird Poop & Revenge Simulator 2.0!

Feel free to wreck havoc as the Raven, then switch sides and play as the disgruntled townsfolk! Isn't Revenge sweet!

-Created By Brandon Jamison-Frankola
